hero.title: Precision Engineering Solutions
hero.subtitle: Delivering High-Quality Brass Precision Components for Automotive, Electric, and Pneumatic Industries

meta.title: Precision Components Manufacturing | Metalloid Services
meta.description: Leading brass precision component manufacturer with 25 years of expertise, offering OEM, customization, and 24/7 customer support across multiple industries.

cta.title: Let's Discuss Your Project
cta.subtitle: Partner with Metalloid for cutting-edge precision component solutions tailored to your specific requirements

items.title: OEM Manufacturing Services
items.description: Metalloid specializes in original equipment manufacturer (OEM) services, providing precision-engineered brass components for automotive, electric, and pneumatic applications. Our advanced manufacturing capabilities ensure high-quality, custom solutions.

items.title: Laser Marking Services
items.description: Our state-of-the-art laser marking technology provides permanent, high-precision identification and branding for precision components. We ensure clear, durable markings that meet the most stringent industry standards.

items.title: 24/7 Customer Support
items.description: Metalloid provides round-the-clock customer support to ensure seamless communication and rapid problem resolution. Our dedicated team is committed to delivering exceptional service and technical assistance.

services.title: Our Service Offerings
services.subtitle: Comprehensive Precision Manufacturing Solutions for Diverse Industrial Needs

items.title: Advanced Production Capabilities
items.description: Our state-of-the-art manufacturing facility enables high-volume, precision component production with rapid turnaround times and consistent quality.

items.title: Technical Engineering Excellence
items.description: With 25 years of experience and cutting-edge technologies, we deliver innovative, custom-engineered precision components.

items.title: Precision and Quality Assurance
items.description: We maintain the highest quality standards through rigorous testing, precision machining, and continuous improvement processes.

capabilities.title: Our Capabilities
capabilities.subtitle: Advanced Technology and Precision Engineering at Your Service

steps.title: Initial Consultation
steps.description: Understand client requirements, technical specifications, and project goals through comprehensive initial consultation.

steps.title: Design and Engineering
steps.description: Develop detailed component designs using advanced CAD/CAM technologies, ensuring optimal performance and manufacturability.

steps.title: Precision Manufacturing
steps.description: Utilize state-of-the-art CNC machining and precision brass manufacturing techniques to create high-quality components.

steps.title: Quality Control
steps.description: Conduct comprehensive quality inspections using advanced metrology equipment to verify dimensional accuracy and performance.

steps.title: Surface Finishing
steps.description: Apply specialized surface treatments, including laser marking, coating, and final precision adjustments.

steps.title: Delivery and Support
steps.description: Package components securely and provide ongoing technical support and consultation throughout the product lifecycle.

manufacturing-process.title: Our Manufacturing Process
manufacturing-process.subtitle: Systematic Approach to Precision Component Engineering
